transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan hello.
Executive: Ji sir aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan aa raha hai boliye.
Executive: Ji mere pass Jitendra ji se ho rahi hai screen group mein.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ji sir main IndiaMART se bol rahi hu aapke account manager.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Lead consume nahi sir view haan main abhi bol rahi hu. Aapke yahan lead consume nahi hui hai is week mein isliye maine aapko connect kiya hai aaj jaise kya kehte hain aaj Wednesday ho gaya hai. Aapko jo lead allocate hoti hai wo Saturday night ko 11:59 pe khatam ho jati hai us hafte ki aur naye hafte ki mil jati hai Sunday ko 12:00 baje raat mein.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Achcha. Aapne matlab aapki jo per day wali ek ek hai wo gayi aapki jaise Sunday, Monday, Tuesday ye gayi to teen lead aapki wo waste ho gayi ab aapke pass bachi hai Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday ek ek din ki ek to char wo aur 10 week ki to aapke pass total 14 lead ka balance abhi bacha hua hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Theek hai? Aur jo hafte wali 10 hai wo aap kabhi bhi le sakte ho matlab aap aaj hi chahe aap 10 le lo lekin aapko Saturday tak matlab unko pura consume karna hota hai.
Customer: Theek hai? Haan.
Executive: Ab 14 hai aur apne pass din bache hai ek, do, teen, char theek hai? Ab char se divide kar do apan ko wahi matlab daily ki upar teen se char lead karni padegi tab jaake wo consume ho payegi. Ek minute ruko main aapka catalog open kar rahi hu.
Customer: Haan main to abhi raste pe hi hu ye kya ho raha hai mere father mere father ka tabiyat kharab ho gaya tha to unko mujhe leke hospital lene gaya tha hospital mein unko admit karake unko wo to ICU abhi ICU pe baithe hain aur unko leke gaya tha hospital abhi sirf parso.
Executive: To aapke father chalate the ya aap matlab?
Customer: Main chalata hu. Haan lekin main to unko leke ja raha hu ki aaj to hospital mein main duty mein hospital duty mein hu to unko leke hospital mein gaya tha. Achanak kya ho gaya kya tabiyat? Nahi nahi unka tabiyat 20-25 din se kharab tha lekin ghar mein jab nahi the management ho paya to maine socha ki chalo ye to hamara Baleswar chota town hai jo Odisha ka capital hai na Odisha ka capital Bhubaneswar wahan yahan se 200 kilometer distance hai unko hum wahan par leke gaye to unka test wagera okay chale gaye fir humko parso 21 tarikh ko date diya gaya hai wahan par fir jana hai to to jo bhi main by lead wagera main dopahar se jaake consume karunga to to main balance kar lunga itna thoda kya ho gaya agar man bhari hoga to aap kuch kisi ke sath in sab baat nahi kar payenge. Yahi problem hua tha.
Executive: Sir wo to hai.
Customer: Haan aur uske baad jo bhi main by lead jisko bhi puchta hu wo koi kehta hai ki main ye galti se maine usko dal diya koi kehta hai ki mera ye bahut purana hai mujhe nahi kharidna hai aisa negative bahut aa raha hai to jisse lag raha hai jaise ye false by lead hai aur wo false hai ki nahi mujhe malum nahi main jaise aise presumption karke aapko bol raha hu lekin koi ek ek percent bhi baat aage nahi badh rahi hai ek din bhi kuch final hone ki to baat chodiye ek din kuch hota hai ki agar aapki taraf se kuch isko kaise manage kar sakte hai help karenge to bahut achcha hota aisa kuch matlab main puchna chahta hu aap se.
Executive: Hmm. Abhi sir dekho agar main dekhu to floor aur incense ki lead aayi hui hai yahan aur yahan pe aayi hui matlab ek dum latest mein aayi hai 16 ghante pehle ki wo yahi hai floor incense stick aur ye buyer ka bhi yahi hai theek hai isme likh rakha hai.
Customer: Wo kahan ka hai?
Executive: Wo chahiye. Ye kahan ka hai sir? Ek to sir dekho yahan pe agar maine lagaya hai all India aur above 10000 ka filter theek hai to ek to Siliguri West Bengal se hai agarbatti raw stick theek hai?
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ke baad hai raw agarbatti Lucknow Uttar Pradesh uske baad hai raw agarbatti jab main all India laga rahe hain na itna dur tak nahi jaate.
Customer: Lekin agar aap near by lagaoge near by ka laga lo matlab isme kya hai na apan ko sab jagah ki dikh jati hai fir wo apne upar hai apan ko kaunsi leni hai kaunsi nahi leni hai wo to filter laga ke bas dekhne ka ek tarika hai ki apan ko dikh jayegi ki chalo is jagah pe bhi ye lead aayi hui hai lekin apan ko wahan business karna hai ki nahi karna wo apne upar hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan usme aapko sari dikh jayegi 50000 wali bhi 10000 wali bhi jaise ab agar aap 50 ka laga doge agar man lo koi 30000 ka order hai to wo fir nahi dikh payega na isliye hum 10000 ka aur all India ka laga dete hain jisse aapko sari leads wahan pe show ho jaye portal pe.
Customer: Achcha. Aapke father ki agar jyada tabiyat na kharab ho to aap mobile application se teen lead aap kar lijiye aaj teen se char lead baki baki aap mobile se IndiaMART ka app scan kar sakte hain na? Haan haan matlab jaruri nahi hai ki on the spot hi call karna hai baat karna hai aap lead rakh lo kyunki agar aap karoge to wo to waste ho jayegi na call bhale hi aap baad mein kar lo ho sakta hai wahi aapko kuch message kar de. Hai na? Isko message client ko buyer ko message drop karke rakh sakte ho jab aapke pass time hoga tab aap unhe call kar lena aisa kar sakte ho.
Customer: To IndiaMART se koi aisa nahi hota ki deal final karne wala agar teen lead aisa nahi ho sakta hai kya ye?
Executive: Sir dekho wo fir aapko koi rakhna padega jisme aapki absence mein wo sari baat baat karke rakh le filter karke rakh le aur jitne bhi kaam kaam ke ho wo aap tak pahuncha de matlab ab jaise agar employee hoga to wo to ye hai na ki agar kisi ko kuch nahi bhi chahiye ya kuch aisa hai to wo 20-25 logon se usne baat ki usme se do se teen log usko kaam ke lage matlab wo filter karke aapko bata diye aapne bas un do se teen se hi baat ki. Samajh rahe ho? Haan ek bar se maine pucha tha ki aap se jo logistic jo transport ka problem wo IndiaMART bhi karta hai? Ship with IndiaMART hai hamare pass aap usme jo bhi aapka amount rehta hai usme aapko tax pay karna rehta hai theek hai usme aapko full payment nahi lagta free rehta hai wo bhejne ke liye lekin aapka jo bhi jitna utna bhi bill hoga usme jo bhi tax hoga bas wo lagta hai aapka.
Customer: Haan wo to buyer ko jab bhi aapko bhejna ho to aapke phone mein left hand pe three dots three line mein jaoge wahan scroll karoge to Ship with IndiaMART ka option aayega uspe click karoge to aap apna booking kar sakte ho wahan se wahan se aap apna saman bhej sakte hain.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Kya aayega wo to video se kaunsi aayega? Booking karna padegi aapko kahan se kahan tak bhejna hai maal? Haan haan. Fir kitne baje bhejna hai wo sab theek karna padega wahan pe. Wahan par likha rehta hai wo? Haan wo aap karoge na to aapko aage step apne aap hi aate chale jayenge. Theek hai theek hai. Theek hai khud hi West Bengal ka hai mujhe customer puch raha tha maine usko kuch theek hai koi dikkat nahi hai. Agar booking karne se pehle humse price janna chahiye ho sakta hai kya? Haan sir. Agar booking ka haan booking nahi karenge sirf usko price janenge uske baad buyer ko hum bhejenge itna aapka lagega uske baad booking hoga aisa nahi hai? Haan baad mein bhi kar sakte ho aap usme bas select kar sakte ho kitna kya lag raha hai. Haan theek hai.
Executive: Wo to transport charge buyer ko dena padta hai agar usko pasand aaye to usko agar chalega haan itna mein lunga itna to hum bolenge theek hai hum yahan se booking confirm kara sakte hain. Ji ji theek hai. Theek hai main aapko ho sake to 5:00 baje ke baad call karunga. Ji ji theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's father is admitted to the hospital.

- Leads are showing negative responses.

- Wants to know if IndiaMART can help finalize deals.

- Wants to know price before booking transport.



Resolution:

- Informed about the remaining leads.

- Executive checked and informed about floor and incense leads.

- Explained how to filter leads by location and price.

- Suggested using the mobile app to manage leads.

- Explained about Ship with IndiaMART for transport.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after 5:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, transport, ship with indiamart, health
